verses.name: Proverbs 30:15
verses.text: The horseleach hath two daughters, crying, Give, give. There are three things that are never satisfied, yea, four things say not, It is enough:

verses.name: Proverbs 30:16
verses.text: The grave; and the barren womb; the earth that is not filled with water; and the fire that saith not, It is enough.

verses.name: Proverbs 30:17
verses.text: The eye that mocketh at his father, and despiseth to obey his mother, the ravens of the valley shall pick it out, and the young eagles shall eat it.

verses.name: Proverbs 30:18
verses.text: There be three things which are too wonderful for me, yea, four which I know not:
